title: Rendering roots, performance discipline
summary: I started in graphics and engine work, where performance is non‑negotiable. It taught me how to profile, measure, and make improvements that actually show up on screen.

title: Full-stack delivery with guardrails
summary: From there I moved into product delivery—building admin tools and APIs, tightening up databases, and putting CI in place so releases felt routine instead of risky.

title: Regulated systems and AI-assisted tooling
summary: These days I work in regulated, reliability-heavy systems. I care a lot about clarity: good logging, good tests, reproducible runs, and tools that help teams move fast without guessing.
